name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Building good habits has never been this easy.This habit tracker is designed to help you keep track of the habits you form and break. It's easy to use and can help you stay on track and achieve your goals.With this habit tracker, you can: Set goals and track your progress. Review your progress and make adjustments as needed. Stay motivated and stay on track with your habits. FAQsHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to
features: Set goals and track your progress.; Review your progress and make adjustments as needed.; Stay motivated and stay on track with your habits.
